title: Hydrological Reference Fabric Tools
text: run clean environment custom options, modify options .Rprofile file project directory workflow executed . Using approach, new callr environment load desired options startup.
code: # See inst/targets/_targets.R for additional configuration options  # to run within the current environment with custom options: options(     rf.config.dir.base = "reference-fabric/",     rf.config.simplify_keep = 0.20 )  reference.fabric::make_fabric(callr_function = NULL)

title: Hydrological Reference Fabric Tools
text: suggested .Rprofile used package development included . Replace “…” values.
code: library(targets)  tar_config_set(script = "inst/targets/_targets.R") tar_option_set(error = "null", debug = "...") options(   rf.config.dir.base = "...",   rf.config.file.nhdplus = "...",   rf.config.file.enhd = "..." )
